attributes.action: Change the law with regard to burial and cremation so that promession (freeze dry process) can be allowed. To provide some rebate to Councils if this is included in recycling achievement.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To encourage promession and change the law which only allows burial or cremation. To reduce the tax on Councils through being more environmentally friendly. 

Promession is a freeze drying process of the  person following Death.  It uses liquid nitrogen which will be released back into its natural form of nitrogen and the remains break down into a dust through vibration.  All metals can then be extracted stopping mercury emissions as in Cremation.  The remains are buried in a environmentally friendly mulch able coffin. Within 12 months the remains are compost and nature will absorb the nutrients and encourage plant life.  It would be a good method of recycling our remains and contribute to the Environment.
